AD.name: Connection Name
AD.description: Unique name for identifying this connection from other REDHAWK Domain connections

AD.name: Server Name
AD.description: Hostname or IP Address of the REDHAWK Naming Service where Domain Managers are registered

AD.name: Port
AD.description: Port where the Naming Service is listening

AD.name: Domain Name
AD.description: Optional name of the REDHAWK Domain Manager (as found in the CORBA Naming Service). If none is specified, you won't be connected to a Domain Manager by default.

AD.name: Device Manager Name
AD.description: The name of the Device Manager to register with REDHAWK. If none is specified, you don't get a Device Manager.

AD.name: Device Manager File System Root
AD.description: The filesystem root of the Device Manager. Defaults to ${redbus.base}, the REDBUS home directory.
